roleset.name: move a body part in a conical motion (e.g. windmilling the arms, rolling the eyes)

example.name: circumduct-v
example.text: So if I found a person who circumducted his or her foot while walking, I would then have to muscle test his or her anterior tibialis and hip flexors.

example.name: circumduction-n
example.text: Gait is steady , although there is a slight circumduction of the left leg .

roleset.note: CIRCUMDUCT-V, CIRCUMDUCTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for THYME.
